lines.text:
[referring to Hadji Murad]
There are many ways of making him give in. For example, crushing his fingers one by one, slowly, while he screams and screams, maddened with pain.

[to Sultanet]
You're a stubborn minx but I like you all the better for it because I know you're not afraid of anything. I hope our children will resemble you.

[to Hadji Murad]
Prisoner? I hope you will consider yourself my guest.
I'm sorry they told you. I wanted to give you a surprise because I knew it would make you so glad.
